siteMetadata.title: Toddlerpillars PFP project
siteMetadata.description: Toddlerpillars are a collection of 9,999 NFTs with over 888 unique and mind-bending traits.This enormous variety ensures that even the most "common" ones will be far from that! Every Toddlerpillar will look dramatically different to its siblings. So much so, that those special creatures, with a combination of the rarest traits, including a handful of 1/1 traits, will be highly coveted by collectors!
siteMetadata.author: @gatsbyjs
